add.allocate_ram_guide: Check out [**this document**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aPF1lyBAfPWyeHIH80F8JJw8rvvy6lRm0WJ2xxSrRh8/edit#heading=h.y78pfyby3w9b) for a guide on how to fix it.
add.eav_crash_1: - Concurrently running programs, such as `OBS` and `Discord`, that use the same graphics card as the game.
add.eav_crash_2: - Using game capture instead of window capture in `OBS`.
add.eav_crash_4: - Driver issues. Check if your drivers are updated and update them, or downgrade them if they're already updated.
add.eav_crash_disclaimer: Please note that the options listed above are not inherently bad things.
add.eav_crash_srigt: - A compatibility issue between `SpeedRunIGT`, `Intel Graphics` and `OpenGL`. (Enable `Safe Font Mode` in `SpeedRunIGT`'s options).
add.exitcode_1073741819_1: - Check if you have a controller plugged in. If you do, unplug it.
add.exitcode_1073741819_3: - Some mods may cause this crash for currently unknown reasons. So far, this has happened with `Sodium`, `SleepBackground` and `LazyDFU`. Try removing these mods/other mods one by one and test if the game still crashes.
add.fabric_guide: Type `!!fabric` for a guide on how to install Fabric.
add.intell_hd2000_info: For more information about this issue and possible solutions, please refer to [**this page**](https://prismlauncher.org/wiki/getting-started/installing-java/#a-note-about-intel-hd-20003000-on-windows-10).
add.java_upgrade_guide: Use [**this guide**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aPF1lyBAfPWyeHIH80F8JJw8rvvy6lRm0WJ2xxSrRh8/edit#heading=h.62ygxgaxcs5a) to upgrade your Java version.
add.mac_setup_guide: You can check out [**this guide**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GomIeW5xdBM) for how to set up speedrunning on a Mac.
error.assets_index_fail: Try restarting your PC and then launching the instance again.
error.autoreset_user: You're using `AutoReset`. It's a really old mod that is no longer allowed. `Atum` is a better version of it. You can download it [**here**]({}).
error.broken_fabric: You're using a completely broken version of `Fabric Loader`. You should update it.
error.broken_java: Your `Java` installation seems to be broken.
error.builtin_lib_crash: You're using your system's {}, which is causing the crash.
error.eav_crash: This crash may be caused by one of the following:.
error.exceeded_id_limit: You've exceeded the hardcoded ID limit. Remove some mods, or install [**JustEnoughIDs**](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/jeid).
error.exitcode_1073741819: Your game crashed with exitcode `-1073741819`. Here are some possible solutions:.
error.forge_too_new_java: You need to use `Java 8` to use `Forge` on this Minecraft version. Use [**this guide**](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aPF1lyBAfPWyeHIH80F8JJw8rvvy6lRm0WJ2xxSrRh8/edit#heading=h.62ygxgaxcs5a) to install it, but make sure to install Java **8** instead of Java **17**.
error.gl_pixel_format: You seem to be using an `Intel` GPU that is not supported on `Windows 10`. You will need to install an older version of `Java`, see [**here**](https://github.com/MultiMC/MultiMC5/wiki/Unsupported-Intel-GPUs) for help.
error.incompatible_forge_mac: You seem to be using an `Apple M1 Mac` with an incompatible version of `Forge`. Add the following to your launch arguments as a workaround: `-Dfml.earlyprogresswindow=false`.
error.incompatible_loader: You seem to be using `Fabric` mods, but you have `{}` installed.
error.incompatible_mod: Mod `{}` is incompatible with mod `{}`. Please remove one of the two.
error.incompatible_srigt: You're using an old version of `SpeedRunIGT` that is incompatible with `Fabric Loader 0.14.15+`. You should delete your current version of `SpeedrunIGT` and download the latest one from [**this page**](https://redlime.github.io/SpeedRunIGT/).
error.incorrect_java_prism: You're using `Java {}`, while you need to use `Java {}`. You can download `Java {}` from [**this page**](https://adoptium.net/temurin/releases/) ({}). Then make sure to select `Java {}` either globally or in your instance's settings.
error.intel_hd2000: Your issue stems from using `Intel HD2000 integrated graphics`, which only supports up to `OpenGL 3.1`. Unfortunately, there are no dedicated `Windows 10` drivers available for this graphics card. As a result, you will not be easily able to run `Minecraft 1.17+`, as `21w10a and later` require improved graphics capabilities beyond `OpenGL 3.1`. You should still be able to play Minecraft versions `1.16 and earlier`.
error.java_comp_check: Disable the `Java compatibility check` in `Settings > Java` either in your instance's settings or in global settings.
error.locked_libs: Another process appears to be locking your native library JARs. To solve this, restart your PC.
error.mac_too_new_java: You are using too new of a `Java` version. Please follow the steps on [**this wiki page**](https://github.com/MultiMC/MultiMC5/wiki/Java-on-macOS) to install 8u241. You don't need to uninstall the other Java version.
error.need_java_17_mc: You are playing on a Minecraft version that requires using `Java 17+`.
error.need_java_17_mods: You are using {} (`{}`) that require{} using Java 17+.
error.no_abstract_logger: Try deleting the folder `.../MultiMC/libraries/org/apache/logging/log4j` and then launching the instance again.
error.no_fabric: You don't have `Fabric` installed, while all MCSR mods require it.
error.no_loader: You seem to be using mods, but haven't installed a mod loader.
error.not_using_mac_sodium: You seem to be using a version of `Sodium` that has a memory leak on `MacOS`. Delete the one you have and download [**this version**](https://github.com/Minecraft-Java-Edition-Speedrunning/mcsr-sodium-mac-1.16.1/releases/tag/latest) instead.
error.online_launch_required: You need to launch your instances in `online mode` at least once before you can launch them in `offline mode`, so that your launcher can download the assets files.
error.outdated_mod: The mod `{}` is not listed as the most recent legal version! Download the latest legal version [**here**]({}).
error.random_forge_crash_1: Try launching your instance `online` if you haven't. Also, try using a different version of `Forge`.
error.random_forge_crash_2: Try restarting your launcher, creating an instance without `Forge` and then installing `Forge` on this instance.
error.really_old_fabric: You're using a really old version of `Fabric Loader`. You should update it.
error.requires_fabric_api: You're using a mod that requires `Fabric API`. It is a mod that is separate to `Fabric Loader`. You can download it [**here**](https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api).
error.requires_mod: A mod you're using is requiring a mod called `{}`, but it is not present. Download it and add it to your mods folder.
error.shaders_mod_plus_of: You've installed `Shaders Mod` alongside `OptiFine`. `OptiFine` has built-in shader support, so you should remove `Shaders Mod`.
error.sodium_config_crash: If this crash happened when you opened the video settings menu or loaded into a world, try deleting `.minecraft/config/sodium-options.json`.
error.too_little_ram_crash: You have too little RAM allocated.
error.too_much_ram: You have way too much RAM allocated, which can cause lag spikes.
note.builtin_lib_recommendation: You seem to be using your system's `{}`. This can cause the instance to crash if not properly setup. In case of a crash, make sure this isn't the cause of it.
note.duplicate_mod: You have several versions of `{}` installed. You should delete the older ones.
note.old_fabric: You're using a somewhat old version of `Fabric Loader`, you might want to update it.
note.onedrive: Your `.minecraft` folder is located in `OneDrive`. `OneDrive` can mess with your game files to save space, and this often leads to crashes. You should move it out to a different folder, and may need to recreate the instance.
note.program_files: Your game files are in `Program Files`. It is generally not recommended, and could cause some issues. Consider moving it to a different location.
note.starlight_better: You're using `Phosphor`. `Starlight` is much better than `Phosphor`, you should use it instead.
note.too_little_ram: You may have too little RAM allocated.
note.too_much_ram: You likely have too much RAM allocated, which can cause lag spikes.
note.use_prism: If you use `M1` or `M2`, it is recommended to use Prism Launcher instead of MultiMC.
note.using_other_loader: Note that using `{} Loader` is not allowed for speedrunning.
note.using_ssrng: You are using the `ServerSideRNG` mod. The server for it is currently down, so the mod is useless and it's recommended to remove it.
warning.exitcode_805306369: Check your `.minecraft/options.txt` file for any values that are set to `0` and are **not** supposed to be `0` (such as `maxFps:0`). If you find any, change them to the values you want and save the file.
warning.relatively_old_fabric: You're using an old version of `Fabric Loader`. You should update it.
warning.too_little_ram: You likely have too little RAM allocated.
warning.too_much_ram: You have too much RAM allocated, which can cause lag spikes.
warning.try_admin_launch: Try opening your launcher with `administrator privileges`.
warning.using_fabric_api: You're using `Fabric API`, which is not allowed for speedrunning. Delete it or remove it from your `.minecraft/mods` folder.
error.ranked_illegal_mod: The mod `{}` is not whitelisted for `MCSR Ranked`. Disable it or remove it from your mods folder.
